Justified Gallery

This plugin allows users to create images which are of high quality and become a justified gallery. These images vary in all sizes. Each space is filled with an image.

Download plugin

http://miromannino.com/projects/justified-gallery/

Arrow down

Add Folders

Add plugin folders to your file

Arrow down

You may need more plugins

Depending on what look and feel you may want for your gallery you may want to add a few more plugins. For instance in my example I created a 'swipebox' look. Therefore, I needed to download the swipbox plugin for my gallery

Start Coding

For a simple Justified Gallery webpage, add

  • css links
  • js scripts
  • or any other additional plugin links or scripts that you may need

HTML tags

Since you will only be working with images be sure to add

  1. div tag with a class or id
  2. a tag
  3. img tag
  4. to create a caption for your images, make sure to add 'alt' in the img tag

JS code

For a simple basic code:

$("div class/id").justifiedGallery();

Code View


                            <!DOCTYPE html> &lt;html&gt; &lt;head&gt; &lt;title&gt;Justified Gallery Plugin
                            &lt;/title&gt; &lt;!--CSS--&gt; &lt;link type="text/css"
                            rel="stylesheet" href="css/style.css" /&gt; &lt;link type="
                            text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="css/justifiedGallery.css" /&gt;
                            &lt;link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="css/swipebox.css" /&gt;
                            &lt;!--jQuery--&gt;&lt;&gt; &lt;/head&gt; &lt;body&gt;
